Source file src/github.com/haraldrudell/parl/parlfs/appdir.go

Documentation: github.com/haraldrudell/parl/parlfs

     5  
     6  package parlfs
     7  
     8  import (
     9  	"path"
    10  
    11  	"github.com/haraldrudell/parl/parlos"
    12  )
    13  
    14  type AppDirectory struct {
    15  	App string
    16  }
    17  
    18  // NewAppDir returns an object providing an app-specific file system location with defered directory creation
    19  func NewAppDir(appName string) (appd *AppDirectory) {
    20  	return &AppDirectory{App: appName}
    21  }
    22  
    23  // AppDir gets an app-specific file system directory
    24  func AppDir(appName string) (directory string) {
    25  	directory = NewAppDir(appName).Directory()
    26  	return
    27  }
    28  
    29  const (
    30  	dotLocalDir = ".local"
    31  	shareDir    = "share"
    32  )
    33  
    34  func (appd *AppDirectory) Directory() (directory string) {
    35  	directory = parlos.HomeDir(path.Join(dotLocalDir, shareDir, appd.App))
    36  	return
    37  }
    38  

Build version go1.17.8.
